purpose
	I should be able to pick 3 colors
		generate a complimentary color set for each color

	assumptions
		hsla is the way to go for calculations
		contrast, brightness, saturation, hue should be mods
		each of above has it's own vector
			discover the vectors

	path
		first route will be to saturate and desaturate in 4 additional intervals - complete
		second route will be to do the same with a complementary color - incomplete
